A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Semaj S\, I'll cite Mark Twain:

"Never argue with stupid people\, they will drag you down to their level and then beat you with experience." 

You have to be very naive and childish to like this movie. If you like bright lights\, deafening sounds\, intense colors\, characters moving around without clear intentions or motivations\, stories without a start or an end... well... continue watching Peppa Pig.
Leave movie critic to the grown people.
